tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Underutilized Hosts

List of host that only use a small portion of the allocated resources and are candidates for resizing.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Hosts with high utilization

Hosts with high utilization of resources, could hint to potential issues and needs for resizing.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Trends (30 days)

Shows average utilization of resources over a longer period of time (30 days). Helps to identify hosts that have increasing resource requirements and could run into issues in the future.
